title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
EB: The first Combo should take focus when clicked.
SR: To reproduce this issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. Press 'Tab' and the focus should go to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
